description:
Cannondale’s relaxed go-anywhere cruiser gets an electronic upgrade. Outfitted with a powerful hub-mounted motor the Adventure Neo makes going to that out of the way bakery or taking the long way home, easier than ever. With both a pedal assist and a thumb throttle, it is easy to add a little extra oomph, or dial it back. While the bar mounted display lets you know how your battery is doing, how fast you are going and more. Big smooth rolling Kenda tires have great grip on bike lanes and backroads. Integrated rack and fender mounts let you customize your new ride for any weather or job. And the kickstand helps your e-bike stand tall when there are no racks in sight.

  • SmartForm C3 alloy frame and chromoly fork, with relaxed geometry
  • Bafang G020 250W drive unit mounted in the rear hub has multiple levels of adjustable throttle
  • Pedal assist puts more power behind every stroke, while the thumb throttle lets you add assist even when you aren’t pedaling
  • Max distance varies with conditions and assistance level; Cannondale quotes a maximum range of 75km
  • Bar mounted display makes it easy to turn your bike (and your lights) on and off, select the right level of assistance, and check on the battery
  • Removable battery is easy to take with you, bring inside for charging, or even swap out. Battery also locks in place for added security
  • To keep your battery performing at its best, follow the manufacturer’s guidelines regarding storage and charging conditions (e-Bike batteries can be very sensitive to cold temperatures)
  • Integrated front and rear lights help you see and be seen, and are powered by the bike’s battery, so you never need to worry about charging these bike lights
  • Part of Cannondale’s EQ (or equipped) line, this bike comes ready to roll with fenders, a rear rack, a front and rear light, reflective details, and a kickstand
  • Wide, ergonomic seat keeps your ride comfy
  • Tektro hydraulic disc brakes offer plenty of stopping power
  • microSHIFT 7-speed drivetrain compliments the Bafang drive unit, putting even more mechanical advantage on your side
  • Plush 2.6in Kenda tires add a little extra cushion
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC Bike Shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Adventure Neo Allroad EQ E-Bicycle - Unisex
